content: if you work this pattern up and if you have instagram i d love to see your finished results tag me in your instagram post @melbjerregaard #melspineapplelacetop **update** i added a strip of elastic to the top of the body to make it a tighter fit - looks better this way imo this pattern has instructions for making the bra section custom sized the rest of the piece is one-sized as there is the possibility for making the button loop larger to extend the body width it is also not that tight of a fit using a larger hook for the body section for example will give a larger fit
